QuestData.Title: The Shaper's Terrace
QuestData.Description: <As you look into the orb in front of you, you hear a voice.>$b$BThe crystal pylons have been activated. A sufficient number of crystals have been gathered. The prerequisites have been met. We are prepared for teleport to The Shaper's Terrace.$b$bSpeak to me when you are ready, $r. We will consult with The Watcher.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Un'Goro Examinant to teleport to The Shaper's Terrace, then speak with Nablya.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with the Un'Goro Examinant to teleport to The Shaper's Terrace, then speak with Nablya.
QuestData.RewardText: I have been watching you, $n. Your arrival was not unforeseen.$b$bIn fact, your arrival here has been predetermined for some time now.
